name: SHOOTERBALL
description:
The idea of shooterball was to create a multiplayer physics sports videogame in first person where passing and ball possession are essential, where stealing a ball is challenging or defending a player without the ball is necessary just like in soccer/football and basketball

PLAY ONLINE WITH YOUR FRIENDS WITH REMOTE PLAY
The online multiplayer is still in development, in the meantime you can play online using remote play, one player owns and runs the game, then up to four players can quickly join in the fun.

SHOTS NEED SKILL
The shots are skill based, you charge the power of your shot depending your distance to the basket
this makes the shots feels very realistic and is skill based and of course your aim is also important

YOUR AIM IS IMPORTANT
SHOOTERBALL is a very skill based game, your aim will be very important for doing baskets, blocks and steals and even to attack your rivals with attack projectiles

VERY TEAM BASE MULTIPLAYER VIDEOGAME
in SHOOTERBALL you can be very accurate with shots, but also you can be very accurate with passing, be able to do super accurate passing makes this game a very team based game, you can even do alley oops!!

ATTACK PROJECTILES (ULTIMATES)
You can take a random attack projectile, this is like an ultimate that will charge over time but you can charge faster depending of your perfomance
doing steals, blocks, baskets etc

SUPER SPEED
Super speed is an ability that you also need to charge, how do you charge it? you charge your super speed by hitting players with attack projectiles

ALPHAS
Alphas are the guns in the game, every alpha feels different , they have different charges speeds making the feeling of shoting and passing different depending of your alpha
